mapper.select: select count(1) as num from user where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
select count(id) as num from common where user_id=#{userId}
select count(id) as num from project_sign where user_id=#{userId}

select a.id,a.project_id as projectId,a.station_id as stationId, a.user_id as userId,DATE_FORMAT(a.sign_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as signDate, b.title as projectTitle,b.description as projectDesc, c.user_name as userName, d.station_name as stationName from project_sign a left join volunteer_project b on a.project_id = b.id left join user c on a.user_id=c.id left join station d on a.station_id = d.id where 1=1 and a.user_id=#{conditionProjectSign.userId} limit #{begin},#{shownum}
select user_name as userName from user where id=#{id}
select count(id) as num from project_sign_arrange where user_id=#{userId}

select psa.id,DATE_FORMAT(psa.start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as startDate,DATE_FORMAT(psa.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as endDate, vp.title as projectName,s.station_name as stationName,u.telphone,u.user_name as userName,psa.hours from project_sign_arrange psa left join project_sign ps on psa.project_sign_id=ps.id left join volunteer_project vp ON ps.project_id=vp.id left join station s on ps.station_id=s.id left join `user` u on psa.user_id=u.id where 1=1 and psa.user_id=#{conditionProjectSign.userId} limit #{begin},#{shownum}
mapper.update: update user set code=#{code} where id=#{id}
update user set statue=1 where id=#{userId}
update user set password=#{password} where id=#{Id}
mapper.select: select count(id) as num from team_sign where user_id=#{userId}

select u.user_name as userName,u.id as userId,u.telphone as userPhone, vt.title as teamName,vt.description as teamDesc,vt.id as teamId,ts.id, DATE_FORMAT(ts.sign_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as signDate from team_sign ts left join volunteer_team vt on ts.team_id=vt.id left join `user` u on ts.user_id=u.id where 1=1 and ts.user_id=#{conditionTeamSign.userId} limit #{begin},#{shownum}
select count(id) as num from user_apply where user_id=#{userId} and apply_type=#{applyType}
select id,user_id as userId,apply_type as applyType,status, DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate from user_apply where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update user_apply set status=1 where id=#{id}

select ut.id,ut.user_id as userId,ut.traning_id as traningId, ot.title as traningTitle,ot.image_url as traningimgUrl,ot.read_num as traningReadNum, ot.collection_num as collectionNum,ut.havewatch_time as havewatchTime,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate from user_traning ut left join user u on ut.user_id=u.id left join online_traning ot on ut.traning_id=ot.id where 1=1 and ut.user_id=#{conditionUserTraning.userId} and ut.type=#{conditionUserTraning.type}
